description:
11.220 scale_vt
Scale and convert the color parameters using VTPixelTransferSession.

The filter accepts the following options:

h.description: Set the output video height expression. Default value is the input height.

w.description: Set the output video width expression. Default value is the input width.

name: scale_vt

parameters.description: Set the output video dimension expression. Default value is the input dimension.
parameters.name: w

parameters.description: Set the output video dimension expression. Default value is the input dimension.
parameters.name: h

source:
11.220 scale_vt

Scale and convert the color parameters using VTPixelTransferSession.

The filter accepts the following options:

w
h

Set the output video dimension expression. Default value is the input dimension.

color_matrix

Set the output colorspace matrix.

color_primaries

Set the output color primaries.

color_transfer

Set the output transfer characteristics.
